data.title: Vivid Yaruki
data.meta_description: Posts about translation written by neyomi
data.text:
The sky showed you the way to reach the stars,

Bathing you in light, turning you into a butterfly

Your downcast eyes couldn’t see it

After floating here by fate, you lose the thrill of hope

Don’t needlessly stir up anxiety,

Raise your flag to the moon

Before you give up hope, rise to heaven above the clouds

For a proud future

Even if you make the world your enemy

I’ll sing so my voice resounds out to you

So you don’t lose what you treasure

The moonlight, dyeing the night silver, dispersed the darkness

The light’s rays formed a prism from behind

Its brilliance set my heart ablaze

Shake your dead future awake

If you’re so afraid, reach out your trembling hands

I’ll hold on tight and lift you up

Nobody else can recall your memories, that’s up to you

Once you’ve risen above the clouds to reach heaven,

Even if you’ve made the world your enemy

It’ll forgive you for everything

I’ll sing so my voice resounds out to you

If you’re despairing, feeling like you’re stuck, can’t see, can’t achieve anything

The future is just blindingly bright

Take a moment to feel the miracle of the present

Before you give up hope, rise to heaven above the clouds

For a proud future

Even if you make the world your enemy

I’ll sing so my voice resounds out to you

So you don’t lose what you treasure

Nobody else can recall your memories, that’s up to you

Once you’ve risen above the clouds to reach heaven,

Even if you’ve made the world your enemy

It’ll forgive you for everything

I’ll sing so my voice resounds out to you

Don’t let go of my hands, we’ll transcend this period again

Romaji:

Sora ga mayoi o tomete ichimen ni hoshi o todoketa

Utsumuita mama ja mienai

Hikari o abi chou ni nare

“Unmei” soko ni ukandara, kitai no SURIRU wa naku naru

Fuan o muda ni aoru na

OMAE no hata tsuki ni agero

Zetsubou suru sono mae ni hokoritakaki mirai no tame ni

Kumo no ue no HEBUN made haiagare

Tatoe sekai o teki ni shitemo

Takaramono nakusanai you ni

Kono koe OMAE ni hibiki todoku you ni utaou

Giniro ni yoru o irodoru gekkou ga yami o tokashita

Hikari no suji gyakkou no PURIZUMU

Mabayui hodo mune kogasu

Shindeta ashita yuriokose

Sonna ni obieteiru no nara furueta sono te sashidase

Nigitte yaru, tsuyoku agero

Kioku o yobiokosu no wa dareka ja nai OMAE shidai

Kumo no ue no HEBUN made tsuita nara

Tatoe sekai o teki ni shitemo

Subete yuruseru n darou

Kono koe OMAE ni hibiki kareru made utaou

Mienakute tsukamenakute kooe nageku gurai naraba

Mabushikute mienai asu o

Kiseki o ima kanjiro

Zetsubou suru sono mae ni hokoritakaki mirai no tame ni

Kumo no ue no HEBUN made hai]gare

Tatoe sekai o teki ni shitemo

Takaramono nakusanai you ni

Kono koe OMAE ni hibiki todoku you ni utaou

Kioku o yobiokosu no wa dareka ja nai OMAE shidai

Kumo no ue no HEBUN made tsuita nara

Tatoe sekai o teki ni shitemo

Subete yuruseru n darou

Kono koe OMAE ni hibiki kareru made utaou

Sono te o hanasu na toki o koe ima hitotsu ni
